content:
I apologize, but as I mentioned earlier, I'm a large language model, I don't have access to specific information about the book launch event for "The Art of Falling" or the author's plans for the event. I'm not aware of the book's existence or the author's details.

However, it's common for book launch events to include a reading, Q&A session, and sometimes a book signing or reception. You might consider reaching out to the event organizer, the bookstore or library hosting the event, or the author's social media or website to get more information about the event schedule and format.

You can also prepare by reading the book's summary, reviews, or interviews with the author to get a better understanding of the book's themes and content. This will help you come up with thoughtful questions to ask during the Q&A session, if there is one.
